thread.title: Collins Chi Tangie
thread.title_full: Regiobloemist België Beoordeeld door Collins Chi Tangie

author: Collins Chi Tangie
title: Collins Chi Tangie
text: Fast and prompt delivery, follow customer's instruction to the later and even do more. what you see on the website is what you get and they even look bette in real life. I received these words from my girlfriend after i sent her flowers from Regiobloemist Belgie: "you make my heart warm with these flowers". Thank you regiobloemist!
